newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Shenzhen bourse orders information for investors.
newsitem.headline: Shenzhen bourse orders information for investors.

text.p: The Shenzhen stock exchange has ordered all brokerages to display on their trading floors the previous day's five biggest gainers and losers starting next Monday, an exchange circular said on Friday.
If the gaining or losing margins are the same, selections will be made according to their trading volumes, the circular said.
If the volumes are the same, selections will be made on differences in turnover, it said.
The brokerage must also make public the five institutional traders in all these shares, the circular said.
The circular said the rule applied to the city's domestic A share market and investment fund market.
The Shanghai stock exchange made a similar announcement earlier on Friday.
